title: Nursing Simulation-Based Team Deliberate Practice (Sim-TDP) Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen simulation education capabilities for practicing nurses, enhancing clinical application skills through team-based deliberate practice in a mobile microlearning environment

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members in a simulation scenario to achieve core nursing intervention goals over 80% within 5 minutes.
Learners can reduce errors by 30% during simulation performance based on feedback and reflective thinking.
Learners can consistently perform simulation practice and self-assessment at least twice weekly using a mobile platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
